pullRequest.title: Apply extractor changes: Add Page class and remove getNextPageUrl()
pullRequest.bodyText:
What is it?

 Bug fix (user facing)
 Feature (user facing)
 Code base improvement (dev facing)
 Meta improvement to the project (dev facing)

Relies on the following changes
TeamNewPipe/NewPipeExtractor#314
Agreement

 I carefully read the contribution guidelines and agree to them.

nodes.bodyText:
You can use Utils.isNullOrEmpty() from NewPipe Extractor as it's now merged.
You'll also see TextUtils.isEmpty() in NewPipe code, it's a method from android.text package, but I don't like the name because it doesn't tell about null check.
